page: CE60101: Design Of Prestressed Concrete Structures

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Early developments, advantages and applications, methods of achieving prestress and materials. Classification in types 1,2 and 3. Mechanics of prestressed concrete design: Magnel's inequalities, kern distances, choice of sections for flexural members, tendon profiles in post tensioned and pre tensioned members, reversal of moments. Limit state design for flexure and shear. Losses in prestress, deflections. Prestress-cast-in-situ composites. Indeterminate structures: continuous beams and portals, secondary moments, concordant and transformed tendon profiles. Anchorage zone stresses; Design of prestressed concrete bridges; Review of IS code.
page: CE60101: Design Of Prestressed Concrete Structures
